Package org.apache.logging.log4j.status

@Export @Version("2.23.1") package org.apache.logging.log4j.status
Status API for Log4j 2. Should not be used by typical applications performing logging but may be used by applications reporting on the status of the logging system
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j
    Public API for Log4j 2.
    org.apache.logging.log4j.message
    Public Message Types used for Log4j 2.
    org.apache.logging.log4j.simple
    Simple logging implementation.
    org.apache.logging.log4j.spi
    Internal interfaces and classes to be used by authors of logging implementations or for internal use by API classes.
    org.apache.logging.log4j.util
    Internal utility classes for the Log4j 2 API.
  • Class
    Description
    StatusConsoleListener
    A StatusListener that writes to the console.
    StatusData
    The Status data.
    StatusListener
    Interface that allows implementers to be notified of events in the logging system.
    StatusLogger
    Records events that occur in the logging system.
    StatusLogger.Config
    Holder for user-provided StatusLogger configurations.
